mapper.select: select orderid from db_order where shoptypeid= #{shoptypeid} and tradeid = #{tradeid}
mapper.update: update db_order set BANSENDFLAG=#{bansendflag},CONTENT=#{content} where TRADEID=#{tradeid} and SHOPTYPEID=#{shoptypeid} and status in ('已支付','配货中')
